actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of certain natives of the Philippines who served in the U.S. Armed Forces during World War II.

summary.text: Authorizes the issuance of immigration visas to aliens who are natives of the Philippines, who served in any United States Armed Force during World War II and who were separated from such service under honorable conditions. Exempts such individuals from paying any fees for such visas.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of certain natives of the Philippines who served in the U.S. Armed Forces during World War II.
